data.current_description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for available folders
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of all folders available in the Xero Files system. Supports filtering and pagination through query parameters. Returns a collection of Folder objects containing folder metadata such as name, ID, and hierarchy information. Use this to browse the folder structure or find specific folders for file organization.
data.reasoning: Summary is too generic. Description mentions 'search' but doesn't clarify search parameters or what folder metadata is returned. Missing details about pagination and response structure. Improved version specifies the operation retrieves all folders, mentions filtering/pagination support, clarifies return type, and provides context for AI agent usage.
